= List =

flags can be combined behind 1 dash. i.e. `ls -tr1`

| Command | Description                              |
|---------|------------------------------------------|
| `ls`    | list.                                    |
| `-t`    | list and sort by data modified           |
| `-r`    | list in reverse order                    |
| `-a`    | show all (including hidden) files        |
| `-1`    | 1 entry per row                          |
| `-l`    | list extra info - size, permissions, etc |
